events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on April 28th involving a rear-end collision at a traffic light.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords such as car, accident, and collision matching the case details.
An agent specializing in auto insurance claims was assigned to handle this customer's accident report.
The customer received an acknowledgement email confirming the receipt of their car accident claim and the next steps involved.
Request sent to the claimant for submission of accident photos, police report, and medical bills related to the vehicle collision.
The claimant successfully uploaded all requested documents including the vehicle damage photos and official police collision report.
Investigation into the car accident has commenced with initial verification of damages and assessment of liability.
The investigation phase concluded after reviewing vehicle repairs, police findings, and statements from involved parties.
A settlement amount was proposed to the claimant based on damage estimates and coverage limits of the auto policy.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling of the claim.
The claim received formal approval, authorizing the issuance of payment to cover the vehicle repair expenses.
The settlement funds were successfully transferred to the claimant's account for repair costs of the damaged vehicle.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and the customer's confirmation of claim resolution.
The entire case file and claim documents were archived for future reference and compliance auditing purposes.
